Case 1:10-cr-00336-JAL Document 438 Filed 02/22/17 Page 6 of 7
By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
Dated: ____________________
By: A. MARIE VILLAFANA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
Dated: ____________________
JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
GERALD LEFCORT, ESQ.
COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: 9-24-07
LILLY ANN SANGREZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Page 7 of 7
DOJ-OGR-00006501

text_blocks.content: By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a Non-Prosecution Agreement between Jeffrey Epstein and the United States Attorney's office. The document is signed by Epstein's attorneys and an Assistant U.S. Attorney. The date '9-24-07' is handwritten on the document.
